Title: Organization of the thalamo-cortical connexions to the frontal lobe in the Rhesus monkey

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "HRP-reaction products were also present in the anterior putamen. Labelled thalamic neurons were present in the medial part of the anterior nucleus, especially in the AM and AV as well as in the RE and the Ce, in particular the CDc (Fig. 1)... the most medial potion of the MD... the anterior pat of the Pm."

"Thus in the rostral thalamus many labelled neurons were present in the VAmc and in the medial parts of VApc and some were present in the Ce... [and] continued ... into the dorsomedial parts of the VLo and the rostral VLc as well as into the dorsorostral part of area X. Along this trajectory the population gradually moved across the internal medullary lamina and continued through the MD into the Pm.."

"... [label] extended (Fig. 1) from the ventromedial part of the VApc into the rostroventral part of area X and from there continued, across the internal medullary lamina, through the ventromedial MD into the anterior part of the Pm."

publication.title: Organization of the thalamo-cortical connexions to the frontal lobe in the Rhesus monkey
